title: Image Batch
description: This schema is used to set images for merchant skus

main_image_url.description: URL location where Jet.com can access the image. Please provide at least 300 x 300 pixels. However, please provide the largest size avaialbe up to a file size of 1MB

swatch_image_url.description: URL location where Jet.com can access an image of a color or fabric for a given merchant SKU. Please provide at least 300 x 300 pixels. However, please provide the largest size avaialbe up to a file size of 1MB

alternate_1_image_url.description: URL location where Jet.com can access the image. Please provide at least 300 x 300 pixels. However, please provide the largest size avaialbe up to a file size of 1MB
